prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are orange, and the opponent is Bill Gates. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (orange) and dissing your opponent (Bill Gates).

sampled.completion1:
"I'm Bill Gates, the one and only
Making history, my story's been told
From the beginning, I was on a roll
Building an empire, I took control

My opponent's an orange, not quite right
A strange and unworthy sight
With a face like a clown, it's a fright
They say it's "presidential," but that's a lie

I'm the real deal, the one to beat
A genius mind, I can't be beat
A force of nature, I'm unique
While my opponent's just a bitter treat

I've made my mark on the world
In technology, I've unfurled
A legacy that will never be curled
While my opponent's just a silly twirl

So here's to me, the greatest of all
While my opponent just takes a fall
I'm the king of the hill, standing tall
And my opponent's just a silly ball."

I'm the one and only, a true original face

Chorus:

But I'm the one with the real class
You can try to imitate, but you'll never be me
Orange is the name, the one and only, can't you see?
